summary: Are you sad about Tony Stark’s death? Don’t be! He doesn’t die until 2023. We have him for four and a half more years. Celebrate...
body: Are you sad about Tony Stark’s death? Don’t be! He doesn’t die until 2023. We have him for four and a half more years. Celebrate him now and then we can mourn in 2023 when that fateful day comes. Thank you for coming to my TED talk.

summary: Hard to love
title: Hard to love
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IyxrpM

by The_silent_smile

She seemed to shift, suddenly showing very clear discomfort with whatever she wanted to tell him or discuss with or for him.

“It’s awful timing. But this can’t really wait.
We need to talk about us.”

“Us?”

“Yes Tony, us.”

“What about us?”

“Us, you and me. I don’t- I can’t do this anymore Tones. I love you, I really do. But this? This isn’t healthy.

Words: 2104, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of The not-so-happy life of Anthony Edward Stark

summary: my love, take your time - Chapter 2 - writerforlife - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
title: my love, take your time - Chapter 2 - writerforlife - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapter Summary:  Morgan and Peter visit Hope Van Dyne and Scott Lang wanting to put their time travel mission into motion but finding unexpected resistance.

Fic Summary:  It’s been twelve years since Tony Stark died. In 2035, Morgan Stark is sixteen years old, and Peter Parker is twenty-eight. When Morgan becomes frustrated that she doesn’t know her dad, she and Peter set out on a journey through time to better learn who Tony Stark really was. But with a threat from the past looming on the home front, Morgan and Peter find themselves with an impossible question: what are their places in Tony Stark’s legacy—and outside of it?

summary: "NO FURY, HYDRA CAN SHOVE IT UP THEIR ASSES FOR ONCE" and is out of the place before fury can finish saying Rogers because his...
question: "NO FURY, HYDRA CAN SHOVE IT UP THEIR ASSES FOR ONCE" and is out of the place before fury can finish saying Rogers because his boyfriend needs him more than SHIELD's stupid mission.(2/2)
answer:
Steve knows what missions he’s needed for and which ones he can skip out on. He’s been around long enough by now and he’s trained more than a few new recruits, so he feels confident in stepping back and letting the newbies take over some recon missions.

Fury doesn’t like it, but if the choice is freezing his ass off in some country he’s never heard of for four days in the hopes of a reclusive scientist possibly making an appearance, or being at home with his arms wrapped around his beautiful partner who is in desperate need of love and attention, then Steve knows what his answer will be in a heartbeat.

On the missions that Steve really can’t bring himself to miss (because he is Cap, after all, and he’s nothing if not loyal to his country and its people), then Steve is in and out like a shot. It’s almost impressive how quickly he finishes his missions and his debriefs leave SHIELD agents with sore hands as they try and write down everything Steve spits out fast enough.

Getting back to their bedroom to see Tony in bed and waiting for him is a sight that Steve will never tire of seeing. It doesn’t happen very often and, though Steve knows it’s all for the wrong reasons, it’s something that makes Steve’s heart pound.

Tony’s head is stuffed full of cold and he’s so completely out of it that he won’t remember Steve’s whispered words of love, but that’s okay. Steve will say them all over again tomorrow.

On the missions that Steve really can’t bring himself to miss (because he is Cap, after all, and he’s nothing if not loyal to his country and its people), then Steve is in and out like a shot. blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Peter Parker's "Perfect" Life
title: Peter Parker's "Perfect" Life
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2wJDlPp

by Keener_girl

Peter Parker had a perfect life. He had his wife, his two daughters, and his son. He was still Spider-Man, and even lived at the compound with other Avengers that were still working after Iron Man saved the world and snapped Thanos away. He loved being in charge of Stark Industries and being able to invent new things every day as technology grew more and more advanced. However, he had no idea that he was missing something. That his ‘perfect’ life wasn’t as perfect as he thought it was.
But he will soon figure it out.
Once a little accident in his lab sends him, his wife, and his daughter into another world, one where things ended differently with Thanos, he sees someone he never thought he would meet again.

Words: 1042, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Michelle Jones, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Steve Rogers, Thor, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Michelle Jones/Peter Parker

blog.name: thegeniusnumber
blog.title: The Genius Number
blog.description: Safe place for Tony Stark (+ Iron Family) fans

summary: 5 Times The Public Saw Tony Give Spiderman Affection - #4 - The One With The Weed
title: 5 Times The Public Saw Tony Give Spiderman Affection - #4 - The One With The Weed
body:
“Boss! Incoming call from Ned Leeds!” FRIDAY’s voice cut through Tony’s fevered work rampage.


“Huh?” he asked. His mind was still wrapped up in his new project. 


“Ned Leeds is calling. Peter’s friend from high school.” FRIDAY tried again.


“Huh… Why does he have my number?” he blinked. Man, his eyes were burning. When was the last time he actually slept?


“Peter probably gave it to him,” if FRIDAY could shrug, she would have done it. “Boss. Do you want to answer it?”


“Yeah. Yeah. Yeah. Put him through!” Tony waved.


“Mr. Stark? Holly shit! Mr. Stark?” Ned’s voice filled the lab.


“Volume!” Tony muttered. “Leeds? How can I help you?”


“Mr. Stark! You have to come here like immediately! It’s Peter!” the kid rambled.


Tony was fully awake and functional the next second. His eyes wide, anxiety activated and reaching level 9000.


“What happened? Where is he?” he asked. He moved quickly towards the lift. As soon as he stepped inside, the little cubic shot upwards. FRIDAY made sure that it was moving as fast as it could. He almost fell over, when it stopped suddenly.


“I don’t know the specifics, but something blew up and Peter is…”


“Peter is what?” Tony snapped. He barely stepped out of the compound and already his suit was wrapping around his body. FRIDAY had the coordinates already thanks to her connection to Karen and she had a flight plan ready for him. He flew off at full speed towards the disaster zone.


“Erm… high?”


Tony nearly lost his balance as he heard the uttered words.


“Come again?” he asked.


He was nearing his destination. He could see thick, dark smoke curling in the sky above something that looked like the remains of a warehouse.  


“Yeah. I’m pretty sure he is high!” Leeds sounded way too cheerful for Tony’s liking.


Tony decided that it was safer to end the call with the teenager if he wanted to keep his sanity. After all, he got his eyes on his protege already and man, things looked bad. First of all, it was not just a warehouse, it was a warehouse complex and half of it was on fire. Spiderman decided that it was a good idea to make a motherfucking hammock between the buildings and sit on it while rocking back and forth. The brat was lucky that he didn’t catch on fire for God’s sake! And was he… giggling?


Oh, and they had caught the public attention all right. Phones and cameras everywhere. Great!


“Spiderman!” he called out sternly. “What are you doing?”


The kid’s head swung towards him and holy shit! He almost lost his balance!


“Mr. Stark! Look! Pretty!” he waved at the flames.


Mr. Stark groaned. Loudly. Prolonged.


“FRIDAY?”


“There is a huge amount of marijuana burning in building C” she supplied. She sounded like someone who was laughing her head off. Bad AI!


“Get me through Karen!” he snapped.


“Yes, Boss!”


“Mr. Stark?”


“What happened Karen?” he asked. He kept his gaze on the wobbly teen. Fortunately, Peter didn’t set off just yet.


“We accidentally caused a gas leak. After the explosion, Peter inhaled some of the smoke.”


“Nice!” Tony huffed. “Take over the suit now!”


“I can’t Mr. Stark.” Karen actually sounded sad. “Peter disabled me.”


“What?” Tony barked.


“He is getting really good at it! You should be proud!”


Tony cursed himself. He should stop making AIs. They all end up sassing back at him in the end.


“Okay.” He sighed. More and more people crowed around the place. They needed to get out of there. “Spiderman! It’s time to go! Come on!”


Peter let out a high pitched sound. Tony froze in the middle of descending next to the teen. The next moment a web was shot towards the nearest building and Peter was swinging away from him.


“Yeeeeeeeet!” the kid shouted as he got further away.


Tony stared after him for a couple of seconds. His face was frozen in shock under the mask. How did this become his life?


“Spiderman!” he shouted enraged when he finally snapped out of his self-pity. He flew after the boy, who kept swinging from building to building while giggling crazily. They ended up in a supernatural game of tag. Tony avoided thinking about how comical the both of them must have looked as he tried unsuccessfully to capture the brat.


In the end, though, luck ran out for the kid. Spider-senses and fast reflexes were good and very useful things if you were sober. However, being this high, things just slip out of perspective. Just like how the web slipped out of the kid’s hand and he ended up slamming into the nearest building’s wall.


Tony winced at the sound, but he was there to catch Peter when he started falling.


“You okay, kid?” he asked hesitantly.


The boy lazily raised his head and the mask’s white eyes stared at him.


“Mr. Stark!” the boy sounded teary. Suddenly four way too strong limbs wrapped around the iron suit and squeezed. The billionaire yelped at the sudden shift and he nearly lost his balance.


“Mr. Stark! It hurt!”  the kid squeezed again.


“It’s okay!” Tony tried to reassure him. He sounded awkward even for his own ears. “You are fine! Right, Karen?”


“He is still high as a kite, but no serious damage!”


Sighing, Tony patted Spiderman’s head as gently as he could in his suit, then he wrapped his arm around the kid’s waist securing him against his armor.


“Hold on tight! We are going home!”


Oh man, the kid had strong arms!


@moonestaly

@tonyparkerstark

“He is still high as a kite, but no serious damage!”


Sighing, Tony patted Spiderman’s head as gently as he could in his suit, then he wrapped his arm around the kid’s waist securing him against his armor.


“Hold on tight! We are going home!”

summary: For the debt I owe, gotta sell my soul 'Cause I can't say no, no, I can't say no Then my limbs all froze and my eyes won't close...
caption:
For the debt I owe, gotta sell my soul
‘Cause I can’t say no, no, I can’t say no
Then my limbs all froze and my eyes won’t close
And I can’t say no, I can’t say no.*

blog.title: I Enjoy Hurting Characters, Okay?
blog.description:
Do you enjoy Whump?

Then you’ll enjoy this page.

Probably.

I take writing prompts, so send ‘em in.

~ Follows from @bleusmainpage ~

tags: answered : people actually ask something of me
summary:
Bad Things Happen Bingo ~ Caught in an Explosion 
Fandom : MCU
Characters : Steve Rogers, Tony Stark 
Whump : Blood, Explosion,...
body:
Bad Things Happen Bingo ~ Caught in an Explosion

Fandom : MCU

Characters : Steve Rogers, Tony Stark

Whump : Blood, Explosion, Passing Out, Recovery, Rescue, Worry

[ @gossipgardener, I added your prompt to this so I can finally get some work done. Thanks for requesting! ]

Steve doesn’t understand what’s happening until it’s much too late. One moment Tony says something’s not right and the next moment the entire building has… exploded.

“Tony?” Steve shouts into his ear piece as he starts running towards the building. “Tony, answer me, are you okay?”

He was in the suit, which was supposed to be basically indestructible, so he was okay, right? He had to be okay.

Steve didn’t know if he could handle him not being okay. Sure, Tony was annoying, and rude, and inconsiderate, and totally a cat person when dogs were better, but he was Steve’s annoying, rude, inconsiderate cat person. He had been for almost a year.

“Tony?”

He had reached the building. Giving no regard for his own safety, Steve ran inside, shouting for Tony to answer him. There was nothing but the roar of fire, the screams of other people, none of them actually in the building. Tony has made sure it had been evacuated.

So why were you still here?

It takes a good amount of time, a good amount of time where Steve breathes in smoke before he finds Tony buried in the rubble. He’s still in his suit, and it’s actually because of the glowing light from his chest that Steve finds him at all.

Pushing rubble aside - big that if he were anyone else it would be nearly impossible - Steve pulls Tony out. Drags him outside, puts him down.

“Tony…”

The face of the suit lifts up. He’s been tossed around so much that beneath the suit he’s covered in marks, bruises and cuts. He’s still out, eyes closed.

“Shit… Tony, wake up.”

After waiting for a few moments, Steve gives up on it. He just picks Tony up, suit and all, and starts running.

—

Tony’s breathing is labored. Badly. Steve doesn’t know if he’s going to be okay. He was going to live, he had to, but in what condition.

There were already people waiting in the Med Bay when Steve burst in, babbling as if he didn’t see them.

“- We need to act quickly, he doesn’t have much time -”

It only takes a moment for Tony to be lifted onto a bed, someone already working on the suit, trying to get it off. They left Steve behind, leaving him nothing to do but wait, and hope for the best.

There were already people waiting in the Med Bay when Steve burst in, babbling as if he didn’t see them.

“- We need to act quickly, he doesn’t have much time -”

It only takes a moment for Tony to be lifted onto a bed, someone already working on the suit, trying to get it off. They left Steve behind, leaving him nothing to do but wait, and hope for the best.
trail.content:
Bad Things Happen Bingo ~ Caught in an Explosion

Fandom : MCU

Characters : Steve Rogers, Tony Stark

Whump : Blood, Explosion, Passing Out, Recovery, Rescue, Worry

[ @gossipgardener, I added your prompt to this so I can finally get some work done. Thanks for requesting! ]

Steve doesn’t understand what’s happening until it’s much too late. One moment Tony says something’s not right and the next moment the entire building has… exploded.

“Tony?” Steve shouts into his ear piece as he starts running towards the building. “Tony, answer me, are you okay?”

He was in the suit, which was supposed to be basically indestructible, so he was okay, right? He had to be okay.

Steve didn’t know if he could handle him not being okay. Sure, Tony was annoying, and rude, and inconsiderate, and totally a cat person when dogs were better, but he was Steve’s annoying, rude, inconsiderate cat person. He had been for almost a year.

“Tony?”

He had reached the building. Giving no regard for his own safety, Steve ran inside, shouting for Tony to answer him. There was nothing but the roar of fire, the screams of other people, none of them actually in the building. Tony has made sure it had been evacuated.

So why were you still here?

It takes a good amount of time, a good amount of time where Steve breathes in smoke before he finds Tony buried in the rubble. He’s still in his suit, and it’s actually because of the glowing light from his chest that Steve finds him at all.

Pushing rubble aside - big that if he were anyone else it would be nearly impossible - Steve pulls Tony out. Drags him outside, puts him down.

“Tony…”

The face of the suit lifts up. He’s been tossed around so much that beneath the suit he’s covered in marks, bruises and cuts. He’s still out, eyes closed.

“Shit… Tony, wake up.”

After waiting for a few moments, Steve gives up on it. He just picks Tony up, suit and all, and starts running.

—

Tony’s breathing is labored. Badly. Steve doesn’t know if he’s going to be okay. He was going to live, he had to, but in what condition.

There were already people waiting in the Med Bay when Steve burst in, babbling as if he didn’t see them.

“- We need to act quickly, he doesn’t have much time -”

It only takes a moment for Tony to be lifted onto a bed, someone already working on the suit, trying to get it off. They left Steve behind, leaving him nothing to do but wait, and hope for the best.

blog.name: s-horne
blog.title: it's like candyland 🍬
blog.description: tony stark, stony, superfamily, tonystarkdefencesquad    //    I also write stony - look for the tag 'i wrote a thing'

summary: Imagine Tony being all cling when sick? Everytime he's under the weather, he's like, "Where's Steve? I want my STEEVEE", and is...
question: Imagine Tony being all cling when sick? Everytime he's under the weather, he's like, "Where's Steve? I want my STEEVEE", and is always restless until Steve pulls him in his lap and rubs his sides and back and litters kisses on his face and hair and Tony falls asleep. Until this one time Steve is on a mission and Tony has fever and he video calls Steve because he can't have him by his side. But one look at his sweetheart's face and it breaks his heart in a million pieces.(1/2)
answer:
I love this idea.

I imagine Tony being much the same way whenever he’s tired as well, but it gets multiplied whenever he’s sick. He hates being ill. It just sucks. There’s so much more he could be doing instead of resting in bed, but Tony can barely so much as look at his tablet before his eyes water and his head starts to pound like a marching band is walking through it.

All he wants is cuddles. Cuddles and lots of love. Tony is usually a pretty independent person, but when he’s ill he can’t stand the idea of being alone even for a second. (Maybe it stems from a troubled childhood and the fear of abandonment, but that’s a topic that is often left untouched.)

Steve doesn’t really care what the reasons are for Tony’s sudden need for comfort because he’s more than happy to take the excuse to hold Tony as close as he can and pepper his whole face with soft kisses. As long as Tony feels a little better, Steve’s happy.

Having to leave Tony for a mission hurts at the best of times, but when Steve knows his partner isn’t feeling 100% himself it makes it so much harder. It’s crossed Steve’s mind that maybe it’s time to hang up the shield if it means he gets to stay at home and smother Tony with love. (Except that when Tony gets better again, he would be back to his usual independent self and Steve would be bored out of his mind without the Avengers)

blog.name: marvelquote-z
blog.title: Double Agent
blog.description:
This blog is for Avengers quotes and misquotes.

@shxriudaku on insta

summary:
Peter: Mr Stark, I need to tell you something.
Tony: Alright. Shoot.
Peter: I’m gay.
Tony: ...
Tony: Peter, I already knew...
body:
Peter: Mr Stark, I need to tell you something.

Tony: Alright. Shoot.

Peter: I’m gay.

Tony: …

Tony: Peter, I already knew that.

Peter, shocked: What! How?

Tony: You introduced me to your boyfriend a month ago.
